description:
From our law office in Las Cruces, New Mexico, the attorneys at Cervantes Scherr Legate, PLLC, provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients across our region who are dealing with complex, pressing legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Defective products and product liability
  • Workplace accidents
  • Personal injury
  • Employment law matters

Our team of dedicated lawyers has decades of combined legal experience. During our time in practice, we have achieved remarkable success fighting for the rights and entitlements of those suffering needlessly as the result of someone else's negligence as well as those who experienced a serious violation of their rights as workers on the job.

As evidence of our success, our lawyers have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, which means you can rely on us to fight aggressively to help you obtain the maximum amount of compensation you need and the justice you deserve.

Honored for our outstanding professionalism and service, our attorneys have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers, including recognition from TopVerdict as having secured some of the largest verdicts ever awarded in the state. We have also received perennial designation from U.S. News & World Report as being one of the Best Law Firms in our area.

To find out how we can best assist you and your family during this difficult and stressful time in your life, you can contact Cervantes Scherr Legate, PLLC, to schedule a free initial consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you safe and healthy.
